Creating and Querying Comments

Source: vignettes/comments.Rmd
comments.Rmd
library(basecamper)
whoami()
#> Yoni Sidi 
#> User Name: yonis@metrumrg.com
#> User ID: 12149241
projs <- basecamp_projects()

(projs_sum <- summary(projs))
#> # A tibble: 20 x 3
#>    company                      id       name                              
#>    <chr>                        <chr>    <chr>                             
#>  1 Metrum Institute             7581035  Journal Club

#>  3 Bill and Melinda Gates Foun… 11663439 Growth and Development M&S        
#>  4 Shire                        13241655 Enzyme Replacement Therapy Progra…

#>  8 Stemline Therapeutics        13589903 Stemline Hourly Consulting STM010…

#> 10 Stemline Therapeutics        13925741 SL401 Hematolgic Cancers          
#> 11 BMS                          13981044 ID01INnhibitor(BMS0701)           
#> 12 AADi Bioscience              14029223 PEComa                            
#> 13 Biogen Idec                  14050694 Parkinson's (BIO0501F)            
#> 14 CSL                          14060588 CSL0401F                          
#> 15 Takeda Pharmaceuticals       14166454 Vedolizumab Adult SC (TAK0204)    
#> 16 Roche                        14222531 Tamiflu                           
#> 17 Merck                        14307782 MER0501F(MK3475)                  
#> 18 Novella                      14354698 PEComa Data Transfer              
#> 19 IQVIA                        14516970 Vedolizumab: Studies 3030 & 3031  
#> 20 Takeda Pharmaceuticals       14542533 Vedolizumab CD (TAK0208F)
(proj_id <- projs_sum$id[grepl('TAK0208F',projs_sum$name)])
#> [1] "14542533"

proj_msgs <- basecamp_messages(scope = 'project',id = proj_id)

(proj_msgs_sum <- summary(proj_msgs))
#> # A tibble: 9 x 2
#>   title                          id
#>   <chr>                       <dbl>
#> 1 Tak0209 Data Questions  109125179
#> 2 Meeting 20190923        109122230
#> 3 TAK0209 initial meeting 109102638
#> 4 SDTM Data Issues        109059458
#> 5 Draft MSP               109038362
#> 6 Project Kickoff         109037877
#> 7 Source Data             109037876
#> 8 Background Material     109037875
#> 9 Project Log             109037874

(msg_id <- proj_msgs_sum$id[grepl('Project Log',proj_msgs_sum$title)])
#> [1] 109037874

View a message contents

Convert message from XML to an html file

msg_file <- proj_msgs%>%
  message_to_html(index = 1) # default a tempfile
cat(readLines(msg_file,warn = FALSE))

2019-09-10T15:25:30Z:Heidi Seaborg:Project Log

  • 2019-09-26T13:29:51Z:Jim Rogers
    Using 0208 repo to how this work: 

    svn+ssh://mc1.metrumrg.com/common/repo/svn-proj-TAK-TAK0208F

  • 2019-09-26T15:04:03Z:Yoni Sidi
    Per phone call with Chunlin 09/25/2019 the correct TNF column in 3031 is ADSL.xpt:TNFGR3
  • 2019-09-26T20:21:11Z:Yoni Sidi
    Meeting with Chunlin, Matthew Hoblin, Wenwen Zhang and Jim Rodgers

    Data assembly for exposure response in 3031 was discussed.

    1. Location for TNF, Albumin, Clinical Remission, Clinical Response and Enhanced Clinical Response was defined

    1. There are not enough patients with endoscopic scores to use in the modeling. It was agreed that this variable will be dropped from 3031 and 13007.

    1. There is no data for rectal bleeding. It was agreed that this variable will be dropped from 3031 and 13007.

  • 2019-10-10T18:23:04Z:Yoni Sidi
    Meeting with Chunlin, Jingjing and Jim Rogers
    1. Chunlin showed us which tables are needed from the 2.7.2 document
    • Tables: 3.k, 3.m
    • Figures: 3.d
    1. Clarification of SoW
    • In the logistic regressions the relevant subjects are week 6 responders
    • Missing baseline covariate values will be imputed by the population median
    1. Additional analysis
    • Chunlin said they will need an additional table of the exposure by quartiles of baseline Albumin (possible OOS)
    1. Data assembly for response data in 13007 was discussed.
    • Verified that the data we have in Millenium archive is what they have internally
    1. Report structure
    • After internal discussions they have decided that two reports are needed Submission: 3031 Publication: 3031 + 13007
    1. Timelines
    • Exposure simulations ETA 10/18
    • Initial ER results 10/31

Creating a Comment

new_comment <- create_comment(scope = 'posts',id = msg_id)

Write the body for the comment

The body can be in two forms

  • Regular text
  • HTML
    • You can write in Markdown and convert it to HTML
    • You can render a Rmarkdown with an html_document output to read in the content
my_body <- 
'What happened in the meeting

1. We went over the 2.7.2 schedule and the following tables were highlighted

  - Tables: 3.k, 3.m
  - Figures: 3.d

2. Clarification of SoW

  - In the logistic regressions the relevant subjects are week 6 responders
  - Missing baseline covariate values will be imputed by the population median

3. Data assembly for response data in IV trial was discussed.

  - Verified that the data we have in the archive is what they have internally

4. Report structure

  - After internal discussions they have decided that two reports are needed
    - Submission: SC trial
    - Publication: SC + IV trials

5. Timelines

  - Exposure simulations ETA 10/18
  - Initial ER results 10/31

'

Convert to HTML

my_body_html <- markdown::markdownToHTML(text = my_body,fragment.only = TRUE)
HTML output (Click to open)

What happened in the meeting

  1. We went over the 2.7.2 schedule and the following tables were highlighted
  • Tables: 3.k, 3.m
  • Figures: 3.d
  1. Clarification of SoW
  • In the logistic regressions the relevant subjects are week 6 responders
  • Missing baseline covariate values will be imputed by the population median
  1. Data assembly for response data in IV trial was discussed.
  • Verified that the data we have in the archive is what they have internally
  1. Report structure

  • After internal discussions they have decided that two reports are needed

    • Submission: SC trial
    • Publication: SC + IV trials
  1. Timelines
  • Exposure simulations ETA 10/18
  • Initial ER results 10/31

Add the body to the new comment object

new_comment%>%
  edit_body(my_body_html)

Send the Comment to the Message Thread

new_comment%>%
  basecamper::post_comment()
